crypto.name: Factoring is Fun
crypto.desc: Factoring is always fun! We're going to play a little game of golf based around factoring. You have 5 minutes to factor a given number, and I'll release more bits of one of the factors throughout the competition until someone solves it!

crypto.name: Weird RSA
crypto.desc: Wanna take a look at this challenge? I tried the normal decryption for RSA but for some reason it isn't working.

crypto.name: malware
crypto.desc: We've identified some ransomeware on one of our employee's systems, but it seems like it was made by a script kiddie. Think you can decrypt the files for us?

pwn.name: replme
pwn.desc:
I found this new programming language and wanted people to be able to try it out.

https://janet-lang.org/

pwn.name: replme2
pwn.desc: Huh, guess I forgot to blacklist a function in my repl. That should be fixed, now.

pwn.name: suckless2
pwn.desc: Supposedly this is C with fewer bullets in your feet, so I'm confident this program doesn't have any security bugs.

rev.name: lambda
rev.desc: I wanted to write this for the C64 I'm not good at 6502
